rows.name: Wild Mind
rows.description: High-mindedness is not your forte. Reduce your Intelligence by 5.

rows.name: Little Friends
rows.description: Small creatures find you attractive. Gnawed possessions and animal droppings are the byproduct. You take a -10 penalty to Fellowship Tests when those creatures would be inappropriate.

rows.name: Plant Growth
rows.description: Holy plant life thrives somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). At the GM's discretion, this may apply a -10 penalty to Fellowship tests in some situations.

rows.name: Seasonal
rows.description: Your body changes through the year. During the winter, reduce your Wounds by 2 and your Movement by 1. In autumn, reduce your Wounds by 1. In spring, increase your Wounds by 1. In summer, increase your Wounds by 2 and your Movement characteristic by 1

rows.name: Rhya's Mien
rows.description: You grow curvaceous and ripe. Grow 1d10/2 inches taller and 2d10 pounds heavier. Increase your Fellowship Characteristic by 5.

rows.name: Trackless Step
rows.description: The forests hide you, and leaves are silent underfoot. Gain the Rover Talent.

rows.name: Enlivened Flora
rows.description: Whenever you remain in a natural setting for more than a round, all living plants within 4 yards grow healthy and lush. Whilst you suffer no ill effects, the area counts as difficult terrain to others and remains so until trimmed back.

rows.name: Nature's Bounty
rows.description: Rhya provides for you. Gain a +10 bonus to all Outdoor Survival Tests.

rows.name: Floral Scent
rows.description: You exude a natural scent of flowers and herbs. Gain a +5 bonus to Charm Tests.

rows.name: Marked by Rhya
rows.description: A symbol of Rhya appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Rhya, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Rhya if they can see the mark.
